title: pAmAlaikkiNai uNDO
sahitya:
pAmAlaikkiNai uNDO subramaNya bhAratiyE nI bhaktiyuDan toDutta


anupallavi

  pUmAlai maNamazhagum azhiyum kaNam bhuvanamuLLa varaikkum kamazhum eLiya naDai


caraNam    tamizhnADu shei-tavappayanAi vandavatarittAi manidar manam iruLODaccandavirttAi
 amizdinum inidu nin kavitaiyin nayamE Arkkum taramO undan arputa karpanai nirai
